definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Naypyidaw has also promised the UN General Assembly it will release more political prisoners.
sentences.chinese: 內比都在聯合國大會上承諾將釋放更多的政治犯。

sentences.english: He spoke at the UN for an hour.
sentences.chinese: 他在聯合國大會上演講了一個小時。

sentences.english: Decisions made by the General Assembly and Economic and Social Council are non-binding.
sentences.chinese: 而聯合國大會和經社委員會的決議不具有約束力。

sentences.english: Engish is chosen as one of the official languages to be used during meetings at the UN.
sentences.chinese: 英語被選爲聯合國大會會議期間的官方語言之一。

sentences.english: The UN General Assembly is expected to confirm the appointment on June 21st.
sentences.chinese: 預計聯合國大會將於6月21日批准該任命。

sentences.english: The UN General Assembly has admitted South Sudan as its 193rd member.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國大會承認南蘇丹爲其第193個成員國。

sentences.english: These days is the UN General Assembly.
sentences.chinese: 這段時間是聯合國大會。

definition: to swear the oath of office
United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
